name: Pledger
slogan: Helping every ecommerce business tell a better story & up conversions
description: Our ethos is to to make it simple for online businesses to give to causes that aline with their brand values. We do this by connecting causes to ecommerce stores and allowing shoppers to choose which cause they want to see donations go to. We also provide re-targeting and loyalty building tools to businesses we work with to make sure they make the most out of cause marketing.

team.name: Mariya K
team.bioHtml: Founder of three successful businesses, Product Manager, Tech for Good entrepreneur and sometimes a dancer

jobs.title: Co-Founder, Growth
jobs.description:
We are on a mission to help businesses attract and retain the new generation of conscious consumers. We do this by connecting businesses with causes that align with their brand

Right now we are on a hunt for a co-founder passionate about our vision to help every on-line businesses be more generous and tell a better story through cause marketing. 

Ideally you have come from a commercial or product background with some experience around growth, new customer acquisition and/or business development. 

Current team consists of the Founder & a CTO. 

If you are excited about Pledger concept - get hold of us & lets have a chat! 

Look forward, 

Pledger team 
hello@pledger.co
